articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft Lists is a new app designed for Teams, SharePoint, and Outlook - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft Lists is a new web and mobile app designed to replace SharePoint Lists. It’s for businesses who use Microsoft 365 to create lists for tracking items internally. Microsoft is planning to start rolling out Lists this summer.
articles.content: The future of SharePoint Lists arrives this summer

articles.title: Google’s new smart textile tech lets you control music by pinching a cord - Digital Trends
articles.description: Google is now experimenting with weaving technology into fabrics and textiles. The concept uses braiding techniques to enable cords to sense gestures.

articles.title: Limited Edition The Last of Us Part II PS4 Pro announced alongside other accessories - Android Central
articles.description: Today, PlayStation announced a new Limited Edition The Last of Us Part II PS4 Pro bundle, which is set to release alongside the game on June 19. There's also some other accessories like a branded headset and external hard drive.
